message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at $12,000. It's a great deal considering its worth to you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000, but that's my final offer. Let's make this deal happen.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm willing to consider $10,500 as a fair price for the product.
